title: Acquia Cloud Site Factory Pingdom
name: Acquia:SiteFactory:Pingdom
description: Ensure the Acquia Cloud Site Factory Pingdom module is enabled.
remediation: Install and enable the Acquia Cloud Site Factory Pingdom module into your codebase.
success: Acquia Cloud Site Factory Pingdom module is enabled.
failure: Acquia Cloud Site Factory Pingdom module is not enabled.
